name: Cyber Attack (itch) (rmitcode)
description:
The Cyber Attack game is created by RMIT Centre of Digital Excellence. This game is for educational purposes only. It is not a published game.  

Cybersecurity refers to the protection activities that prevent critical systems and sensitive information from malicious digital attacks. Also known as information technology security or electronic information security. In modern business, every internet user needs cybersecurity. With an increasing number of users, devices, and programs, a deluge of data in nowadays business, and accompanied by the volume and sophistication growth of cyber attackers, the importance of cybersecurity continues to grow.
